pr_title: avoid unnecessary allocation in handoff between PendingTrace and CoreTracer

timeline.message: simplify handoff between PendingTrace and CoreTracer which avoids an unnecessary ArrayList allocation
simplify handoff between PendingTrace and CoreTracer which avoids an unnecessary ArrayList allocation

timeline.bodyText: I don't understand why sending a new ArrayList is better than sending this.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: Because CoreTracer always copies its input between one and four times. The aim is to avoid copying when we do a partial flush. This just simplifies it.
replies.author: richardstartin

timeline.author: richardstartin
